001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003/**
004 * RADAR CLI dispatcher that routes to subcommands.
005 * <p>Provides the {@code radar} entry point packaged with application distributions.</p>
006 *
007 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
008 */
009public final class Main {
010  private Main() {}
011
012  /**
013   * Dispatches to a specific CLI based on the first argument.
014   *
015   * @param args command array where {@code args[0]} selects the subcommand
016   * @throws Exception if the delegated CLI throws
017   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
018   */
019  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
020    if (args == null || args.length == 0) {
021      usage();
022      return;
023    }
024    String command = args[0].toLowerCase();
025    String[] rest = java.util.Arrays.copyOfRange(args, 1, args.length);
026    switch (command) {
027      case "capture" -> CaptureCli.main(rest);
028      case "live" -> LiveCli.main(rest);
029      case "assemble" -> AssembleCli.main(rest);
030      case "poster" -> PosterCli.main(rest);
031      case "segbingrep" -> ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools.SegbinGrepCli.main(rest);
032      default -> usage();
033    }
034  }
035
036  private static void usage() {
037    System.out.println("Usage: radar <capture|live|assemble|poster|segbingrep> [options]");
038  }
039}
